parameters.query: INSERT INTO baseline_profiles (user_id, administered_at, O_T, C_T, E_T, A_T, N_T, O_p01, C_p01, E_p01, A_p01, N_p01, norm_version) VALUES ({{ $json.user_id }}, '{{ $json.administered_at }}', {{ $json.O_T }}, {{ $json.C_T }}, {{ $json.E_T }}, {{ $json.A_T }}, {{ $json.N_T }}, {{ $json.O_p01 }}, {{ $json.C_p01 }}, {{ $json.E_p01 }}, {{ $json.A_p01 }}, {{ $json.N_p01 }}, '{{ $json.norm_version }}');
